name: The Deep (itch) (ks3)
description:
The Deep

A game about dodging things. And sometimes blowing them up.

Disclaimer

This is work in progress. Lot's of things are missing. "Fun" is not guaranteed while playing.

Instructions

Click or tap anywhere to swim there.

Press [ space bar ] or tap the icon to drop a bomb.

Drop bombs where things are about to appear.

Don't be there when things appear or you will be torn to shreds and die a horrible death that I would not wish upon my worst enemy be forced to take a swim.

There are three difficulty modes:

  • Hardcore: The way it's meant to be played
  • Normal: Three lives and that's it
  • Easy: Three lives and they regenerate
What's New
  • Basic gameplay with three enemy types
  • Three difficulty modes
  • Linear difficulty
  • Basic animations
  • Local high scores
  • Beautifully handcrafted majestic art
Story, because every game needs one

You were out on the ocean in your favorite row boat, enjoying the pleasant weather, warm summer sun beating down on your lucky yellow straw hat, just minding your business, when suddenly!!!

Without any warning!!!1!

Things started popping up from the deep, hell bent on bringing you down with them. Lucky that you did not forget to pack with you your handy set of infinitely recharging explosive barrels. You'll give those critters what for!

Of course you could just dodge them all... I mean it's not their fault that you've invaded their territory and they are just defending themselves. But that wouldn't be fun now, would it? Or maybe it would.

Well, it's up to you to decide!
